articles.author: GRAHAM LEE BREWER, CURT ANDERSON
articles.title: Leonard Peltier leaves prison after Biden commuted his sentence in the killing of two FBI agents - The Associated Press
articles.description: Native American activist Leonard Peltier has been released from a Florida prison, weeks after then-President Joe Biden angered law enforcement officials by commuting his life sentence to home confinement in the 1975 killings of two FBI agents. A prison offici…
articles.content: SUMTERVILLE, Fla. (AP) Native American activist Leonard Peltier was released from a Florida prison on Tuesday, weeks after then-President Joe Biden angered law enforcement officials by commuting his … [+4428 chars]
